bill.title: Public Housing; Disposition of Abandoned or Seized Property
bill.description: Establishes a process whereby the Hawaii Public Housing Authority may dispose of abandoned or seized property that it has acquired on state low-income housing projects. Effective July 1, 2013. (HB888 CD1)

history.action: Pending introduction.
Introduced and Passed First Reading
Referred to HSG, FIN, referral sheet 5
Bill scheduled to be heard by HSG on Monday, 02-04-13 8:45AM in House conference room 329.

The committees on HSG recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 5 Ayes: Representative(s) Cabanilla, Woodson, Kobayashi, Morikawa, Cheape; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Belatti, Carroll, Jordan.
Reported from HSG (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 287) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.

Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Belatti, Cachola, Coffman, Takai excused (4).
Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Wednesday, 02-27-13 11:30AM in House conference room 308.

The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 17 Ayes: Representative(s) Luke, Nishimoto, Johanson, Cullen, Hashem, Ing, Jordan, Kobayashi, Lowen, Morikawa, Onishi, Takayama, Tokioka, Woodson, Yamashita, Fukumoto, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 874) as amended in HD 2, recommending passage on Third Reading.
Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 03-05-13.
Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 2 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 300).
Passed First Reading.
Referred to HMS/JDL, WAM.
The committee(s) on HMS/JDL has scheduled a public hearing on 03-19-13 1:30PM in conference room 016.
The committee(s) on JDL deferred the measure until 03-21-13 10:30AM in conference room 016.

The committee(s) on HMS recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in HMS were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Chun Oakland, Green, Taniguchi; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Kidani, Slom.

The committee(s) on JDL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDL were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Hee, Shimabukuro, Gabbard, Ihara; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Slom.
Reported from HMS/JDL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1008) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to WAM.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to WAM.
The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 03-25-13 9:20AM in conference room 211.
The committee(s) on WAM deferred the measure until 03-27-13 9:00AM in conference room 211.

The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in WAM were as follows: 11 Aye(s): Senator(s) Ige, Kidani, Chun Oakland, Dela Cruz, Espero, Kahele, Keith-Agaran, Ruderman, L. Thielen, Tokuda, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) English, Kouchi.
Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1340) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading.
One Day Notice 04-09-13.
Report adopted; Passed Third Reading. Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 538) in amended form (SD 1).
House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).
Received notice of disagreement (Hse. Com. No. 650).
House conferees appointed: Cabanilla, Woodson Co-Chairs; Tokioka, Ward.
Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 697).
Senate Conferees appointed: Chun Oakland, Chair; Hee, Ige, Co-Chair(s); Kahele, Slom.
Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 697).
Conference committee meeting scheduled for 04-18-13 3:45PM in conference room 229.
Senator(s) Espero replaced Senator(s) Ige as (Co-) Chair(s).
Received notice of change in Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 709).
Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Monday 04-22-13 3:45PM in conference room 229.

The Conference Committee recommends that the measure be Passed, with Amendments. The votes were as follows: 4 Ayes: Representative(s) Cabanilla, Woodson, Tokioka, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 0 Excused: none.

The Conference committee recommends that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes of the Senate Conference Managers were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Chun Oakland, Espero, Kahele; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Hee, Slom.
Reported from Conference Committee (Conf Com. Rep. No. 33) as amended in (CD 1).
Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 04-30-13.
Reported from Conference Committee as amended CD 1 (Conf. Com. Rep. No. 33).
48 Hrs. Notice (as amended CD 1) 04-30-13.
Passed Final Reading, as amended (CD 1). 25 Aye(s); Aye(s) with reservations: none . 0 No(es): none. 0 Excused: none.
Passed Final Reading as amended in CD 1 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and none excused (0).
Received notice of Final Reading (Sen. Com. No. 755).
Received notice of passage on Final Reading in House (Hse. Com. No. 761).
Transmitted to Governor.
